document.docAuthor: Astafurova, Yulia V. & Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu.
document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the genus Sphecodes Latreille 1804 of Siberia, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Halictidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bees of the genus Sphecodes Latreille 1804 of Siberia, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Halictidae)

bibRefCitation.refString: Smith, F. (1845) Descriptions of the British species of Bees belonging to the genus Sphecodes of Latreille. Zoologist, 3, 1011 - 1015.
